message: I propose we split the money 9000/1000. I figure it's fair to take the lion's share, as I'm the one who initiated the game. ;)
I think 5500/4500 is a fairer split considering the inflation. Let's end this quickly and both walk away with a decent sum.
I'm willing to negotiate. I'll take 6000, leaving you with 4000.  This way we both get more than your last offer, and we can finally end this game!
